#summary Build Bamboo and VIC for Linux platform
#labels build,Phase-Implementation,bambooDHT

= Introduction =

Build Bamboo DHT

= Steps: =
# Copy Bamboo src to the destination folder, for example, /usr/local/
# Change the owners of the source code to your accountID, 
for example; chown -R yourname:yourname BambooDHT
# Build the BambooDHT by executing the command: make
# Build the document of BambooDHT by executing make inside doc directory: 
cd doc/
make
# Build the java document by executing make inside doc/javadocs directory:
cd doc/javadocs/
make
